channel.title: Odd problem
channel.description:
Hello everyone. I have encountered a rather odd problem. I changed my announcements, but for some reason it still shows this.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/vgstmt.jpg[/img]
Now the problem is the items in the red box only show when you FIRST log in, as in when it registers your account. I cannot find any reason as to why this happens. If anyone has the InsidiaX source, would you mind shedding some light on this issue, and possibly a fix for it. Thanks, in advance.
